name: Pet of the Week – Tank
description: Meet this week's Pet of the Week, Tank! Tank is an active German Shepherd/Chow-Chow mix who is a great playmate that loves heavy-duty toys.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet this week’s Pet of the Week, Tank! Tank is an active German Shepherd/Chow-Chow mix who is a great playmate that loves heavy-duty toys. If you are interested in adopting Tank or any other pets, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
